INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Increase of the effect of the vitamin K antagonist and of the risk of hemorrhage
INTERACTION.COMMENT: More frequent testing of the INR. Possible adjustment of the dosage of the vitamin K antagonist during the treatment with the fluoroquinolone and after it is stopped.

INTERACTION.DESCRIPTION: Decrease of the digestive absorption of the fluoroquinolones
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the iron salts at a different time from the fluoroquinolones (more that 2 hours apart if possible).

Decrease of the concentrations of the mycophenolic acid by about a third, with potential risk of reduction of effectiveness.
Decrease of the digestive absorption of the strontium
INTERACTION.COMMENT: Take the strontium at a different time from the fluoroquinolones (more than two hours apart if possible).
